law.catch_line: Additional information required from bidders or proposers seeking to demonstrate that joint venturer DBEs, BBEs, HBEs, WBEs, CBEs, CSBEs or small or local businesses will perform a commercially useful function in the work of a County contract.

text.section: Sec. 2-8.7. Additional information required from bidders or proposers seeking to demonstrate that joint venturer DBEs, BBEs, HBEs, WBEs, CBEs, CSBEs or small or local businesses will perform a commercially useful function in the work of a County contract.
